snippet: Georgetown announced the resignation of the director of its track and field and cross-country programs after two investigations of reports involving allegations of racial bias, hazing and sexual misconduct.
abstract: Pat Henner, director of Georgetown University track and field and cross-country programs, resigns amid allegations of racial bias, hazing and sexual misconduct.
lead_paragraph: Georgetown announced the resignation of the director of its track and field and cross-country programs after two investigations of reports involving allegations of racial bias, hazing and sexual misconduct.
